title: Marketplace for Wednesday, Feb. 11, 2014
byline: Kai Ryssdal, Annie Baxter, Sally Herships, Adam Allington and Sam Beard
description: Airing on Wednesday, Feb. 11, 2015: New dietary guidelines say cholesterol-rich foods like eggs, lobster and shrimp aren’t necessarily bad for us after all. What kind of ripple effect will these latest guidelines have in the food business? Plus, with Jon Stewart leaving "The Daily Show," we look at the corporate importance of the program in the Viacom universe. Also, the president wants to commit ground troops to combat ISIS. What does that mean in terms of soldiers and logistical support?
